languages.text: "Я так часто себе это повторяю, что перестал понимать смысл слов. Кстати, о словах..."
"I have told myself that so many times, I don't know what the words mean anymore. Speaking of words..."
languages.original_text: "Я так часто себе это повторяю, что перестал понимать смысл слов. Кстати, о словах..."

traits.locale_text: "I have told that to myself so many times, I don't know what those words mean anymore. Speaking of words..."
"I have told that to myself so many times, I don't know what those words mean anymore. Speaking of words..."
"I have told myself that so many times, I don't know what the words mean anymore. Speaking of words..."
"I have told myself that so many times, I don't know what the words mean anymore. Speaking of words..."
"I have told myself that so many times, I don't know what the words mean anymore. Speaking of words..."
"I have told myself that so many times, I don't know what the words mean anymore. Speaking of words..."

languages.text: 「何度も何度も自分にそう言い聞かせてきたせいで、その言葉の意味すらもう分からなくなってしまいました。言葉といえば…」
languages.original_text: "I have told myself that so many times, I don't know what the words mean anymore. Speaking of words..."

traits.locale_text: 「何度も何度も自分にそう言い聞かせてきたせいで、その言葉の意味すらもう分からなくなってしまいました。言葉といえば…」

languages.text: "Das habe ich mir selbst schon so oft gesagt, dass ich nicht mehr weiß, was die Worte bedeuten. Apropos Worte ..."
languages.original_text: "I have told myself that so many times, I don't know what the words mean anymore. Speaking of words..."

traits.locale_text: "Das habe ich mir selbst schon so oft gesagt, dass ich nicht mehr weiß, was die Worte bedeuten. Apropos Worte ..."

languages.text: « Je me le répète depuis si longtemps que je ne suis même plus certain du sens de ces mots. À propos de mots... »
languages.original_text: "I have told myself that so many times, I don't know what the words mean anymore. Speaking of words..."

traits.locale_text: « Je me le répète depuis si longtemps que je ne suis même plus certain du sens de ces mots. À propos de mots... »

languages.text: «Yo mismo me he dicho eso en repetidas ocasiones, tanto que las palabras han perdido su significado. Y hablando de palabras...».
languages.original_text: "I have told myself that so many times, I don't know what the words mean anymore. Speaking of words..."

traits.locale_text: «Yo mismo me he dicho eso en repetidas ocasiones, tanto que las palabras han perdido su significado. Y hablando de palabras...».

languages.text: “我也是这样告诉我自己的，说了太多次，我自己都想不清楚这些话是什么意思了。另外，说到这个……”
languages.original_text: "I have told myself that so many times, I don't know what the words mean anymore. Speaking of words..."

traits.locale_text: “我也是这样告诉我自己的，说了太多次，我自己都想不清楚这些话是什么意思了。另外，说到这个……”

languages.text: "İmparator bilir, kendimi kaç defa bu şekilde telkin etmeye çalıştım ama faydası yok. Artık bu kelimeler benim için hiçbir şey ifade etmiyor. Kelime demişken..."
languages.original_text: "I have told myself that so many times, I don't know what the words mean anymore. Speaking of words..."

traits.locale_text: "İmparator bilir, kendimi kaç defa bu şekilde telkin etmeye çalıştım ama faydası yok. Artık bu kelimeler benim için hiçbir şey ifade etmiyor. Kelime demişken..."

languages.original_text: "I have told myself that so many times, I don't know what the words mean anymore. Speaking of words..."
